item.title: City council member faces additional charges in absentee ballot investigation
item.description: A city councilor in Connecticut is facing new charges in connection with an investigation into absentee ballot tampering in the state’s largest city

item.title: Trump’s global tariffs are unlawful, appeals court says
item.description: A federal appeals court has ruled that most of President Donald Trump’s sweeping global tariffs are unlawful.

item.title: WATCH: Trump cuts nearly $5B of foreign aid
item.description: President Donald Trump told Congress that he will slash $4.9 billion of congressionally-approved USAID and State Department foreign aid funding.
